verses.verse: Praise <WH1984> ye Jehovah <WH3050>. Sing <WH7891> unto Jehovah <WH3050> a new <WH2319> song <WH7892>, And his praise <WH8416> in the assembly <WH6951> of the saints <WH2623>.
Let Israel <WH3478> rejoice <WH8055> in him that made <WH6213> him <WH1121>: Let the children of Zion <WH6726> be joyful <WH1523> in their King <WH4428>.
Let them praise <WH1984> his name <WH8034> in the dance <WH4234>: Let them sing praises <WH2167> unto him with timbrel <WH8596> and harp <WH3658>.
For Jehovah <WH3068> taketh pleasure <WH7521> in his people <WH5971>: He will beautify <WH6286> the meek <WH6035> with salvation <WH3444>.
Let the saints <WH2623> exult <WH5937> in glory <WH3519>: Let them sing for joy <WH5937> upon their beds <WH4904>.
Let the high <WH7319> praises of God <WH410> be in their mouth <WH1627>, And a two-edged <WH6374> sword <WH2719> in their hand <WH3027>;
To execute <WH6213> vengeance <WH5360> upon the nations <WH1471>, And punishments <WH8433> upon the peoples <WH3816>;
To bind <WH631> their kings <WH4428> with chains <WH2131>, And their nobles <WH3513> with fetters <WH3525> of iron <WH1270>;
To execute <WH6213> upon them the judgment <WH4941> written <WH3789>: This honor <WH1926> have all his saints <WH2623>. Praise <WH1984> ye Jehovah <WH3050>.
